overview: The factories of Britain have a Trade Union to represent the workers who elect one of themselves as their shop steward to speak on their behalf in the workshop as well as round the National conference table. Mistakes or grievances in shop or department can, as a rule, speedily be righted by brief discussion between Management and the workersâ€™ representative. The film shows a meeting of the Trade Union Congress which represents every kind of Trade Union in Great Britain.
title: Each For All
